SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum , frm.* FROM ( SELECT aa.cln_code , aa.pat_code , aa.emp_id , TO_CHAR(aa.cln_date,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi') AS cln_date , aa.cln_descr , bb.pat_name , yy.emp_name FROM tb_clinic aa INNER JOIN tb_patient bb ON aa.pat_code = bb.pat_code INNER JOIN tb_employee yy ON aa.emp_id = yy.emp_id
ORDER BY cln_date DESC ) frm ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT cln_code , pat_code , emp_id , TO_CHAR(cln_date,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi') AS cln_date , cln_descr FROM tb_clinic WHERE cln_code = #{clnCode}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM ( SELECT aa.cln_code FROM tb_clinic aa INNER JOIN tb_patient bb ON aa.pat_code = bb.pat_code INNER JOIN tb_employee yy ON aa.emp_id = yy.emp_id
)
SELECT cln_code FROM ( SELECT cln_code, cln_date, MAX( cln_date ) OVER() AS last_date FROM tb_clinic a ) WHERE cln_date = last_date
